name: Junior Begineer(4-8 Yrs)
detail: Ignite creativity with fun, hands-on art projects for our youngest artists.

name: Junior Learner(9-12 Yrs)
detail: Explore various techniques and styles to build a strong foundation in art.

name: Senior Seeker(12-15 Yrs)
detail: Advance your skills with more detailed projects, fostering artistic growth.

name: Sr.Expressors(16+ Yrs)
detail: Express yourself with techniques and personal creative exploration.

name: Special classes
detail: Customized lessons for unique projects or specific artistic interests.

name: Premium Classes
detail: Exclusive one-on-one sessions for personalized artistic mastery.
